name: dfvd2impr
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2
body: |- wi(wi(w0, wi(w1, w2)), wvd2(w0, w1, w2))

stmt.origin: biimpri(wi(w0, wi(w1, w2)), wvd2(w0, w1, w2))

body.origin:
|- wi(wi(w0, wi(w1, w2)), wvd2(w0, w1, w2))
-| wb(wvd2(w0, w1, w2), wi(w0, wi(w1, w2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wi(w0, wi(w1, w2)), wvd2(w0, w1, w2))
-| wb(wvd2(w0, w1, w2), wi(w0, wi(w1, w2)))

body.origin: |- wb(wvd2(w0, w1, w2), wi(w0, wi(w1, w2)))

cumulated.origin: |- wi(wi(w0, wi(w1, w2)), wvd2(w0, w1, w2))

comment: A 2-antecedent nested implication implies its virtual deduction form. (Contributed by Alan Sare, 21-Apr-2011.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
